st.en: My name is Bekzod, I'm 13 years old. I'm interested in programming and currently work with Node.js (Express), PostgreSQL, and React PWA. I mainly focus on security systems like authentication and authorization (JWT, access token, refresh token). I always strive to learn new technologies and try to improve my projects.
st.uz: Men Bekzod, 13 yoshdaman. Dasturlashga qiziqaman va hozirda Node.js (Express), PostgreSQL, va React PWA bilan ishlayman. Asosan authentication va authorization (JWT, access token, refresh token) kabi xavfsizlik tizimlari ustida ishlayman.Doim yangi texnologiyalarni oâ€˜rganishga intilaman va loyihalarimni takomillashtirishga harakat qilaman.
